sentences.en: Antibiotic ointments are useful for concurrent bacterial infections.
sentences.cn: 抗菌素软膏对伴发的细菌感染是有用的.

sentences.en: Bacterial reproduction is accelerated in weightless space.
sentences.cn: 在失重的空间,细菌繁殖加快了.

sentences.en: Bacterial transposons carry genes encoding antibiotic resistance.
sentences.cn: 细菌转座子可以携带对抗生素的抗性基因.

sentences.en: Brain lesions can be caused by bacterial infections.
sentences.cn: 大脑损伤可能由细菌感染引起.

sentences.en: Burn patients are febrile before there is sinificant bacterial colonization of born wound.
sentences.cn: 烧伤病人在伤口有显著的细菌集落生长以前就可以发热.

sentences.en: Fever in surgical patients commonly represents bacterial infection.
sentences.cn: 外科病人的发热通常表示细菌性感染.

sentences.en: In bacterial systems transport activities are performed by membrane proteins.
sentences.cn: 在细菌系统中运输活性是通过膜蛋白实现的.

sentences.en: Phage chromosome is inserted into the continuity of the bacterial chromosome.
sentences.cn: 噬菌体染色体被插入细菌染色体中.

sentences.en: Serizyme, a standardized bacterial proteolytic enzyme, may be used.
sentences.cn: 丝胶酶是一种标准的细菌解朊酶, 也可以应用.

sentences.en: Staphylococcal food poisoning is the most common bacterial food poisoning.
sentences.cn: 葡萄球菌性食物中毒是最常见的一种细菌性食物中毒.

sentences.en: The bacterial cells are rendered competent.
sentences.cn: 使细菌细胞变成感受态.

sentences.en: The term pyelonephritis refers to immediate and residual effects of bacterial infection in the kidney.
sentences.cn: 肾盂肾炎一词系指肾脏遭细菌感染的直接或遗留后果.

sentences.en: This bacterial decay of cellulose also occurs in the gut of most herbivorous animals.
sentences.cn: 在很多食草动物的肠内这种纤维素也能被细菌分解.

sentences.en: ZFN may also be induced by bacteria, some bacterial endotoxins.
sentences.cn: 某些细菌 、 细菌内毒素都可能诱导干扰素的形成.

trans.tran_en: Bacterial is used to describe things that relate to or are caused by bacteria
